It look here like you have an XML error in your metadata. Could you please zip 
up your metadata and attach it to this PR.
Did something happen when you exited the workspace?

I can't remember anything unusual happened.
I use WinXP with hebrew support, but I don't think it's related.

Would you still have that workspace. I am interested in the 
file .metadata/plugins/org.eclipse.ui/workbench.xml. Otherwise will be dificult 
to guess why we could not parse the file.

No, I don't have that file anymore. If the problem happens again I will attach 
the file to this bug report.

Genady

Marking as WORKSFORME since I can't reproduce it.
Please reopen if you see the problem again.
